biotools.summary: CView is an alignment visualizer that expands on the per-site representation of residues through the incorporation of a dynamic network that is based on the summarization of diversity present across different regions of the alignment. The relationship that sequence regions that are currently on screen have to other regions of diversity within the alignment can be observed, thus increasing intuitive insight.
